CustomField.description: If a provisioning or deprovision ticket is required. This is set automatically by trayIO flow according to the product integration record configuration at the time subscription is activated/terminated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a provisioning or deprovision ticket is required. This is set automatically by trayIO flow according to the product integration record configuration at the time subscription is activated/terminated.
CustomField.label: Provisioning Ticket Required
